channel.title: How do i fix the duel bug?
channel.description: hi i have no clue how to fix the duel bug its where u can press duel on the person withing a time limit and u can use pray armour mage and run even if its checked off

item.title: How do i fix the duel bug?
item.dc:creator: @dizzle11 dizzle11
item.description:
@dizzle11 wrote:

well once u start the duel u can press trade oe duel on the person withing like 2 seconds of the duel and they can for sum reason get around the options wepons off box prayer off box magic off box and no retreat box
